data.weather: 15mm last week. Further 11mm rain on Monday . Dry for Tuesday and Wednesday. 1.5mm rain on Weds PM / Thurs AM, then dry Thurs afternoon. 5mm rain overnight Thursday. Dry and bright on Friday and winds building. A dampening of less than 0.5mm overnight, but very strong winds, Av speed 25mph. Forecast: Currently light rain which should move on by day break to leave a dry day. Further strong winds of c.25mph expected all day, possibly stronger in the gusts.

The away chase bend remains 6 yards out from the innermost line (same as 14.11 and 25.11), while the away hurdle bend is now 9 yards out from the innermost line. The effect on the official race distances is as follows: Race 1: +99yds Race 2: +90yds Race 3: +126yds Race 4: +54yds Race 5: +63yds Race 6: +108yds Race 7: +63yds
